info.name: CCEP Payment Collection V1
info.description:
Postman collection for payment collection demonstration. Written by Carl Newton [canewton@Cisco.com](https://mailto:canewton@Cisco.com) January 2024. Uses JDS collection authored by Arunabh Bhattacharjee and Barry Mclellan at [https://github.com/WebexSamples/webex-contact-center-api-samples/blob/main/customer-journey-samples/cjds-postman-example/JDS%20CiscoLive.postman_collection.json](https://github.com/WebexSamples/webex-contact-center-api-samples/blob/main/customer-journey-samples/cjds-postman-example/JDS%20CiscoLive.postman_collection.json)

Github Repo: [https://github.com/canewton-ccep/PaymentCollections](https://github.com/canewton-ccep/PaymentCollections)

item.name: Create email default events for journey-default-template
Create chat default events for journey-default-template
Create telephony default events for journey-default-template Copy
Create social default events for journey-default-template
Get Progressive Template values against user
Get Progressive Template values against user using template-id instead - journey-default-template2
Get History Stream by Identity with filters

body.raw:
{  "id": "{{$guid}}",
  "specversion": "1.0",
  "type": "Payment",
  "source": "SMS%20Notifcation",
  "identity": "+12263762555",
  "identitytype": "phone",
  "datacontenttype": "application/json",
  "data": {
    "phone": "+12263762555",
    "Reason": "Late Payment Notification Sent – Notification",
    "MessageForUser" : "We have noticed your Waterbill payment is overdue. The payment of $544.73 was due Thursday, March 23rd.",
    "LinkSent": "https://buy.stripe.com/test_4gw8AnfIUbLBcbC8wB",
    "Notification": "1",
    "Past Due Amount": "$544.73",
    "category": "Water",
    "status": "overdue",
    "origin": "Past Due - 1st Notification",
    "channelType": "Payment Notify",
    "channelBreakout": "sms"
}}

  "identity": "+12263762555",

  "data": {
    "phone": "+12263762555",
    "Reason": "Late Payment Notification Sent – Notification",

body.raw:
{  "id": "{{$guid}}",
  "specversion": "1.0",
  "type": "Payment Queue",
  "source": "Voice%20Contact",
  "identity": "+12263762555",
  "identitytype": "phone",
  "datacontenttype": "application/json",
  "data": {
    "phone": "+12263762555",
    "CallsQueuedNow":"Use GetQueueInfoNode Values",
    "OldestCallTime":"Use GetQueueInfoNode Values",
    "LoggedOnAgents":"Use GetQueueInfoNode Values",
    "PIQ":"Use GetQueueInfoNode Values",
    "EWT":"Use GetQueueInfoNode Values",
    "category": "Payment",
    "origin": "Payment Queue",
    "channelType": "QueueCallNeutral",
    "channelBreakout": "voice"
}}
